Package hms.hms_main

Class HospitalManagementSystem

Object
HospitalManagementSystem
public class HospitalManagementSystem extends Object
Main class for the Hospital Management System (HMS). This system manages user authentication and provides role-specific functionalities for patients, doctors, pharmacists, and administrators. Data is loaded from CSV files, and users interact with the system via a command-line interface. Features include: - User authentication - Role-based menus and options - Management of appointments, medical records, medications, and staff - Exporting patient records

  • Field Details

    • patientList

      static List<Map<String,String>> patientList
      List of patient information. Each map contains patient details such as name, ID, age, etc.

    • staffList

      static List<Map<String,String>> staffList
      List of staff information. Each map contains staff details such as name, ID, role, etc.

    • doctorList

      static List<Map<String,String>> doctorList
      List of doctor information. Each map contains doctor details such as name, ID, specialization, etc.

    • pharmacistList

      static List<Map<String,String>> pharmacistList
      List of pharmacist information. Each map contains pharmacist details such as name, ID, role, etc.

    • medicineList

      static List<Map<String,String>> medicineList
      List of available medications. Each map contains medication details such as name, price, quantity, etc.

    • doctorAvailability

      static Map<String,Map<String,List<String>>> doctorAvailability
      Availability schedule of doctors. Key: Doctor's name, Value: Map where: - Key: Date - Value: List of available timeslots.

    • replenishmentRequests

      static List<Map<String,String>> replenishmentRequests
      List of replenishment requests for medication. Each map contains replenishment request details such as medicine name, requested quantity, etc.

    • loginCredentials

      static Map<String,String> loginCredentials
      Map of user login credentials. Key: User ID, Value: User password.

  • Constructor Details

    • HospitalManagementSystem

      public HospitalManagementSystem()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point for the Hospital Management System. Prompts users to log in with their hospital ID and password. Upon successful authentication, displays role-specific menus and options.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used in this application).

    • authenticate

      public static User authenticate(String hospitalId, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on their hospital ID and password.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The ID of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      A User object representing the authenticated user, or null if authentication fails.

    • createStaffList

      public static void createStaffList()
      Loads the staff list from a CSV file. Populates the staffList with data from the file.

    • createDoctorList

      public static void createDoctorList()
      Loads the doctor list from a CSV file, filtering only records where the role is "Doctor". Populates the doctorList with doctor-specific data.

    • createDoctorAvailList

      public static void createDoctorAvailList()
      Loads doctor availability data from a CSV file. Parses the availability dates and times for each doctor and populates the doctorAvailability map.

    • createPharmacistList

      public static void createPharmacistList()
      Loads the pharmacist list from a CSV file, filtering only records where the role is "Pharmacist". Populates the pharmacistList with pharmacist-specific data.

    • createMedicineList

      public static void createMedicineList()
      Loads the medicine inventory from a CSV file. Populates the medicineList with data about medications, including stock levels and prices.

    • createPatientList

      public static void createPatientList()
      Loads the patient list from a CSV file. Populates the patientList with patient-specific data, including medical history and contact information.

    • PatientOption

      public static void PatientOption(String pid, Patient p)
      Displays menu options for a logged-in patient and handles their interactions. Allows patients to: - View and update personal information - Manage appointments - View billing details - Export records
      Parameters:
      pid - The ID of the logged-in patient.
      p - The Patient object representing the authenticated patient.

    • DoctorOption

      public static void DoctorOption(String did, Doctor d)
      Displays menu options for a logged-in doctor and handles their interactions. Allows doctors to: - View and update patient medical records - Manage their schedules and availability - Accept or decline appointment requests - Record appointment outcomes - View their ratings
      Parameters:
      did - The ID of the logged-in doctor.
      d - The Doctor object representing the authenticated doctor.

    • PharmacistOption

      public static void PharmacistOption(String phid, Pharmacist ph)
      Displays menu options for a logged-in pharmacist and handles their interactions. Allows pharmacists to: - View appointment outcome records - Manage medication inventory - Update prescription statuses - Submit replenishment requests
      Parameters:
      phid - The ID of the logged-in pharmacist.
      ph - The Pharmacist object representing the authenticated pharmacist.

    • AdministratorOption

      public static void AdministratorOption(String aid, Administrator ad)
      Displays menu options for a logged-in administrator and handles their interactions. Allows administrators to: - Manage staff details - View and manage appointments - Approve replenishment requests
      Parameters:
      aid - The ID of the logged-in administrator.
      ad - The Administrator object representing the authenticated administrator.
